textContent: For real time generated items, quests, or whatever: create a parallel table (item_template_custom) and give it the same architecture as the original. Modify the core to first check item_template at boot and then periodically check item_template_custom. Also, for item checks clientside (using weapon abilities, right clicking...) override the usual process to incoude the custom table
